title: Three by Three Jotblock Portable Watercolor Studio
description:
Create watercolor paintings wherever inspiration strikes. Our new Portable Watercolor Studio set offers everything needed for a watercolor studio on-the-go... just add water! Felt carrying case opens to reveal a wood tray with neatly arranged, easily accessible watercolor supplies and tools in individualized compartments. Heavy-duty magnet snaps close the case securely for safe travels.

  • Dimensions: 12.5 x 8.25 x 1.5 in.
  • Materials: 100% recycled felt case. Wood supply tray. Mixing palette integrated in lid. Large flat brush for background washes, two round brushes for detailed work.Fine-point black marker for crisp detailing. Heavyweight textured watercolor paper pad
